title: Cellular alterations increase vulnerability of obese and diabetic individuals to infection

title_detail.value: Cellular alterations increase vulnerability of obese and diabetic individuals to infection

summary: A study identifies changes to neutrophils that appear to explain why people suffering from obesity and type 2 diabetes are more likely to contract infectious diseases.

summary_detail.value: A study identifies changes to neutrophils that appear to explain why people suffering from obesity and type 2 diabetes are more likely to contract infectious diseases.
